mapper.select: SELECT id, order_type, order_no, customer_id, customer_name, goods_from, supplier_id, start_wh_id, dest_wh_id, start_wh_operator, dest_wh_operator, send_parties, in_wh_way, order_status, descr, main_id, cr_time, up_time, inner_org_id FROM in_order where id = #{id}

SELECT id, order_type, order_no, customer_id, customer_name, goods_from, supplier_id, start_wh_id, dest_wh_id, start_wh_operator, dest_wh_operator, send_parties, in_wh_way, order_status, descr, main_id, cr_time, up_time, inner_org_id FROM in_order where 1 = 1 order by id desc
